Package org.sakaiproject.tool.gradebook.jsf

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssignmentGradeValidator
    Validates assignment grades entered into the gradebook.
    AssignmentPointsConverter
    This formatting-only converver consolidates the rather complex formatting logic for assignment and assignment grade points.
    CategoryItemValidator
    Validates category item value entered on the Gradebook setup page.
    CategoryPointsConverter
    This formatting-only converver consolidates the rather complex formatting logic for assignment and assignment grade points.
    ClassAvgConverter
    This formatting-only converter consolidates the rather complex formatting logic for the display of class avg.
    ClassAvgConverterBasicDisplay
    This formatting-only converter displays appropriate class avg depending on grade entry method for this gradebook.
    CourseGradeConverter
    Validates and standardizes course grades.
    DivMessageRenderer
    Put the message in a "div" instead of a "span", allowing for much more positioning control.
    DivMessageRendererBase  
    DivMessagesRenderer
    Work around JSF 1.1's inadequate Messages renderer, which has the following problems: - Contrary to the documentation, an HTML list is not used to render a list.
    DropScoresConverter  
    DropScoresValidator
    Validates that drop scores values entered on the Gradebook setup page (dropLowest, dropHighest, keepHighest) are positive.
    FacesPhaseListener  
    FacesUtil
    A noninstantiable utility class, because every JSF project needs one.
    HtmlSortHeaderRenderer
    Based on org.apache.myfaces.custom.sortheader.HtmlSortHeaderRenderer.
    LetterGradeConverter
    Validates and standardizes letter grades.
    NontrailingDoubleConverter
    The standard JSF NumberConverter handles output formatting of double numbers nicely by printing them as an integer if there's nothing past the decimal point.
    PercentageConverter
    The standard JSF number formatters only round values.
    PointsConverter
    The standard JSF number formatters only round values.
    PrecisePercentageConverter
    The standard JSF number formatters only round values.
    ScoreConverter
    This formatting-only converver consolidates the rather complex formatting logic for the display of a student's score.
